data.description: Use rrdtool within perl script via pipes
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Tobi Oetiker and I discussed the pros and cons of putting the perl
    mods that come with RRDtool up on CPAN. In the end, we feel that
    there is more to be gained by all if they are there. RRDtool is a
    round robin database, so it's placement in Data seems natural and
    fitting.
